title: NixOS Package PRs for htop
description: NixOS Package PRs for htop on GitHub

items.title: flake.lock: Updating 'nixpkgs (NixOS/nixpkgs)' - 08ef0f28 -> 22a500a3

items.content_html:
Motivation for this change

Based on #161707. Looking for more packages to test this way, feel free to suggest.

Things done
  • Built on platform(s)
    • x86_64-linux
    • aarch64-linux
    • x86_64-darwin
    • aarch64-darwin
  • For non-Linux: Is sandbox = true set in nix.conf? (See Nix manual)
  • Tested, as applicable:
    • NixOS test(s) (look inside nixos/tests)
    • and/or package tests
    • or, for functions and "core" functionality, tests in lib/tests or pkgs/test
    • made sure NixOS tests are linked to the relevant packages
  • Tested compilation of all packages that depend on this change using nix-shell -p nixpkgs-review --run "nixpkgs-review rev HEAD". Note: all changes have to be committed, also see nixpkgs-review usage
  • Tested basic functionality of all binary files (usually in ./result/bin/)
  • 22.05 Release Notes (or backporting 21.11 Release notes)
    • (Package updates) Added a release notes entry if the change is major or breaking
    • (Module updates) Added a release notes entry if the change is significant
    • (Module addition) Added a release notes entry if adding a new NixOS module
    • (Release notes changes) Ran nixos/doc/manual/md-to-db.sh to update generated release notes
  • Fits CONTRIBUTING.md.
items.title: htop: add test with expect

items.content_html:
Description of changes

Sometimes, when we use overrideAttrs, we don't care about the "old" values. With this change we can now write something like this:

htop.overrideAttrs { src = ~/htop; }

Without this change we would need to wrap it in a function, who's argument we ignore:

htop.overrideAttrs (_: { src = ~/htop; } )

I can also update the documentation.

cc @mweinelt since this might be a policy change.

Things done
  • Built on platform(s)
    • x86_64-linux
    • aarch64-linux
    • x86_64-darwin
    • aarch64-darwin
  • For non-Linux: Is sandbox = true set in nix.conf? (See Nix manual)
  • Tested, as applicable:
    • NixOS test(s) (look inside nixos/tests)
    • and/or package tests
    • or, for functions and "core" functionality, tests in lib/tests or pkgs/test
    • made sure NixOS tests are linked to the relevant packages
  • Tested compilation of all packages that depend on this change using nix-shell -p nixpkgs-review --run "nixpkgs-review rev HEAD". Note: all changes have to be committed, also see nixpkgs-review usage
  • Tested basic functionality of all binary files (usually in ./result/bin/)
  • 23.05 Release Notes (or backporting 22.11 Release notes)
    • (Package updates) Added a release notes entry if the change is major or breaking
    • (Module updates) Added a release notes entry if the change is significant
    • (Module addition) Added a release notes entry if adding a new NixOS module
    • (Release notes changes) Ran nixos/doc/manual/md-to-db.sh to update generated release notes
  • Fits CONTRIBUTING.md.
items.title: lib.makeOverridable: allow attrs for overrideAttrs

items.content_html:
• readme: use less ambiguous user name in example
  • github: configure dependabot
  • gnome-terminal: Add audibleBell option (nix-community#1671)
  • imapnotify: switch to goimapnotify instead of node-imapnotify (nix-community#1675)
  • waybar: allow CSS class when using a default module
  • programs.neovim: write config in $XDG_CONFIG_HOME/init.vim (nix-community#1652)
  • tests: bump nmt
  • tests: add support for asserting warnings
  • waybar: fix css identifier check (nix-community#1687)
  • docs: improve phrasing around backwards compatibility
  • direnv: fix the fish source
  • docs: some extension for flakes users
  • octant: add module
  • octant: add code owner entry
  • pam: add note about future deprecation
  • nushell: fix link in the description (fixes nix-community#1693) (nix-community#1694)
  • plan9port: add module
  • home-manager: add zsh completion
  • starship: remove deprecated character.symbol setting
  • broot: add package option
  • flake: add extraSpecialArgs
  • doc: clarify what is user environment
  • docs: rephrase warning section slightly
  • fish: fix regression due to changes in Nixpkgs
  • docs: remove stray ` from README.md
  • sway&i3: refactor replace moduleName check with variables

items.title: da alactritty csiu

items.content_html:
To try this use the pkgsUutils overlay and replace python3 with any package:

nix-build -A pkgsUutils.python3

ToDo:

  • merge #116241
  • wait for 1f831f0 to be in master

Issues preventing us from using it in a stdenv:

  • autotools does not work because the died not handle escape codes uutils/coreutils#1817
  • install does not work when installing files from directors uutils/coreutils#1823
  • head does not work with null bytes uutils/coreutils#1822
  • touch cannot parse some date uutils/coreutils#2311
  • cp to many files open uutils/coreutils#2312
  • cp main panic uutils/coreutils#2314
  • converting absolute symlinks to relative ones uutils/coreutils#2335
  • ln multiple --symbolic uutils/coreutils#2359
  • missing symlink from test to [ uutils/coreutils#2420
  • tr posix character classes uutils/coreutils#2421
  • cp dangling or nested symlinks uutils/coreutils#2422
  • cp permission denied uutils/coreutils#2423
  • cut not working in rustc uutils/coreutils#2424
  • Fix installation of [ symlink https://github.com/uutils/coreutils/pull/2491
  • Create completion directories incase they do not exist uutils/coreutils#2490
Motivation for this change
  • Try it out!
  • https://discourse.nixos.org/t/rust-coreutils-replacement/11867
Things done
  • Tested using sandboxing (nix.useSandbox on NixOS, or option sandbox in nix.conf on non-NixOS linux)
  • Built on platform(s)
    • NixOS
    • macOS
    • other Linux distributions
  • Tested via one or more NixOS test(s) if existing and applicable for the change (look inside nixos/tests)
  • Tested compilation of all pkgs that depend on this change using nix-shell -p nixpkgs-review --run "nixpkgs-review wip"
  • Tested execution of all binary files (usually in ./result/bin/)
  • Determined the impact on package closure size (by running nix path-info -S before and after)
  • Ensured that relevant documentation is up to date
  • Fits CONTRIBUTING.md.
items.title: stdenv: add uutils-coreutils stdenv
